textAfterTable: 10/22/2011 Concussion, injured reserve. 7/06/2011 Signed as an unrestricted free agent by the Columbus Blue Jackets to a one-year contract. 3/08/2011 Missed 7 games (lower body injury). 2/22/2011 Lower body injury, day-to-day. 1/11/2011 Missed 9 games (left wrist injury). 2010 12/31/2010 Left wrist injury, injured reserve. 12/16/2010 Missed 2 games (arm injury). 12/11/2010 Arm injury, day-to-day. 4/11/2010 Missed the last 66 games of the regular season (torn right ACL). 2009 11/07/2009 Torn right ACL, remainder of the regular season. 1/08/2009 Missed 17 games (right shoulder injury). 2008 12/04/2008 Right shoulder injury, sidelined indefinitely. 11/15/2008 Missed 14 games (right shoulder injury). 10/13/2008 Right shoulder injury, late November. 2007 12/26/2007 Bruised leg, day-to-day. 10/05/2007 Re-signed by the New York Islanders to a three-year contract extension. 4/20/2007 Missed the last 30 games of the regular season and all 5 games of Round One against the Buffalo Sabres (fractured leg). 4/08/2007 Fractured leg, remainder of the playoffs.
